description: A mystical orb containing the essence of life.
info: For strength heroes, it grants 225 health, 1.25 health regen, 1% magic resistance, 1.6 armor, 10 attack speed, 0.5% movement speed, 120 mana, 0.5 mana regen, 0.7% spell damage and 10 attack damage.
For agility heroes, it grants 180 health, 1 health regen, 0.8% magic resistance, 2 armor, 12.5 attack speed, 0.63% movement speed, 120 mana, 0.5 mana regen, 0.7% spell damage and 10 attack damage.

For intelligence heroes, it grants 180 health, 1 health regen, 0.8% magic resistance, 1.6 armor, 10 attack speed, 0.5% movement speed, 150 mana, 0.63 mana regen, 0.88% spell damage and 10 attack damage.
